Reviews.Title: Great Camera.
Reviews.Author: Richard A
Reviews.Content: This camera was easy to match to my monitor.  It was easy to install and delivers a clear consistent image.

Reviews.Title: crap
Reviews.Author: craig aubuchon
Reviews.Content: I think this was a rip off and I am returning it. No way this is good for 40 feet. Not even 15 feet

Reviews.Title: Price is fair
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: works great  and easy to setup. could use longer or extra power cord for outdoor use. haven't tried to setup IPhone yet.

Reviews.Title: BEWARE: Defective Products from DEPENDABLE RESOURCE. No Remedy.
Reviews.Author: jonathan char
Reviews.Content: Management fails to acknowledge defects. YOU WILL BE STUCK WITH DEPENDABLE RESOURCE PRODUCT AND DEFECTS. I wish I never bought from Dependable Resource. DO NOT BUY. VERY TERRIBLE EXPERIENCE with Dependable Resource DEFECTIVE PRODUCTS go without acknowledgement.

Reviews.Title: wrong model
Reviews.Author: LWB
Reviews.Content: I had to return this camera as I dis not check its compatibility with my system.  Check Uniden's website first!.

Reviews.Title: Great Camara
Reviews.Author: nr0d
Reviews.Content: I have the whole system and bought 2 extra camaras. It works very well for my home survellance needs! They are easy to connect to the monitor and are plug and play.

Reviews.Title: watchdog1
Reviews.Author: R. J. ROSS "Chariot Driver"
Reviews.Content: This system provides you with a picture of decent resolution and the abilitiy to record events 3 different ways: motion detection, scheduled events & manual programming. The only problm I have is the placement of the 4 cameras I have to avoid continuous recording while in motion detection mode. Cameras are very sensitive to nearby motion.  Great overall results so far.

Reviews.Title: No color
Reviews.Author: bob
Reviews.Content: No color but everything else worked good pic in black and white,wish they where checked before shipping need help with color please

Reviews.Title: good for the price
Reviews.Author: kenneth d. stickney
Reviews.Content: does what it says it does. dont care for the fact that the camera is on 24/7 and the only way to shut off is to unplug it..inconvenient depending on where it is.

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality
Reviews.Author: Mark H.
Reviews.Content: Had to mush trouble getting the camera connect . Coustom service put you on hold for about 30 minutes. The cameras keeping getting crossing each other camera.

Reviews.Title: Uniden UDSC15 Outdoor Camera
Reviews.Author: wayne
Reviews.Content: better this time last time no good Uniden UDSC15 Outdoor Camerado not think I will buy from again at this time

Reviews.Title: pairing
Reviews.Author: lrrp246 "lrrp"
Reviews.Content: will not pair, talked with uniden and still will not pair. I just gave up for now. Feel like driveing over it with my car.

Reviews.Title: GREAT OUTDOORS CAMERA SETUP!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey A.
Reviews.Content: I live in a over 55 park.I bought it to keep my yard nice and clean! We have a lot of people that walk there dogs and don't like to clean up there dogs mess.I bought the extra 2 cameras also for the back yard because we are on the edge of the woods and have deers and turkeys that wonder through. It was very easy to set up,and the picture on the monitor is very clear! I now have it set up on my phone so I can monitor it also at work! I LOVE IT!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: loi giang
Reviews.Content: camera is very nice and the cost is not that bad.highly recommend to anyone that is looking for a security camera.

Reviews.Title: shipped on time
Reviews.Author: Richard A. Schnitzler "RICO!!!"
Reviews.Content: great product! i would recommend this to any one.  pairs quick and easy!  i will be getting another very soon!

ProductInfo.Features:
Weather Proof IP66 (Outdoor)
40-Feet Night Vision
Mounts to wall or ceiling
Motion Detection
IR Cut Filter for True Color
ProductInfo.Name: Uniden UDSC15 Outdoor Camera
